Chapter Twenty-One - The Poor in the Church

     The Needy of the Household of Faith.--Our love for God is to be expressed in doing good to the needy and suffering of the household of faith whose necessities come to our knowledge and require our care. Every soul is under special obligation to God to notice His worthy poor with particular compassion. Under no consideration are these to be passed by.-- Testimonies, vol. 6, p. 271.
